text: The Socialist Party of Albania ( ; PS or PSSh) is a social-democratic political party in Albania. It was founded in June 1991 inspired by the ideas of Enver Hoxha. The party became popular after it gained power following the 2013 parliamentary election. The current Prime Minister Edi Rama is a member of the party. ==References== Category:1991 establishments in Europe Category:Social democratic parties in Europe Category:Politics of Albania Category:20th-century establishments in Albania
title: Socialist Party of Albania
